title: Tampulma - Genesis Portion
description:
Tamprusi is a Gur language of Ghana.

The Tamprusi are located in the North Gonja District of the newly created Savannah Region. Some of their communities are also found in the East Mamprusi Municipal District in the North East Region where they relocated in the 17th Century.
provider: Ghana Institute of Linguistics Literacy and Bible Translation

language.name: Tampulma
language.area: North central, south of Sisaala, Damongo District. 25 villages.
